mapper.update:
update kt_document
document_title = #{documentTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
document_age_limit = #{documentAgeLimit,jdbcType=INTEGER},
document_file_path = #{documentFilePath,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
document_file_name = #{documentFileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
document_file_time = #{documentFileTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
created_at = #{createdAt,jdbcType=BIGINT},
created_way = #{createdWay,jdbcType=INTEGER},
created_by_key = #{createdByKey,jdbcType=CHAR},
created_by_name = #{createdByName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
check_state = #{checkState,jdbcType=INTEGER},
check_report = #{checkReport,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
checked_by_key = #{checkedByKey,jdbcType=CHAR},
checked_by_name = #{checkedByName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where document_key = #{documentKey,jdbcType=CHAR}

update kt_document set document_title = #{documentTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, document_age_limit = #{documentAgeLimit,jdbcType=INTEGER}, document_file_path = #{documentFilePath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, document_file_name = #{documentFileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, document_file_time = #{documentFileTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, created_at = #{createdAt,jdbcType=BIGINT}, created_way = #{createdWay,jdbcType=INTEGER}, created_by_key = #{createdByKey,jdbcType=CHAR}, created_by_name = #{createdByName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, check_state = #{checkState,jdbcType=INTEGER}, check_report = #{checkReport,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, checked_by_key = #{checkedByKey,jdbcType=CHAR}, checked_by_name = #{checkedByName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where document_key = #{documentKey,jdbcType=CHAR}

update kt_document set check_state = #{checkState,jdbcType=BIGINT}, checked_by_key = #{checkedByKey,jdbcType=CHAR}, checked_by_name = #{checkedByName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, check_report = #{checkReport} where document_key = #{documentKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select count(document_key) from kt_document where check_state=#{checkState} and created_way=#{createdWay}
select count(document_key) from kt_document where (created_at BETWEEN #{firstTime} and #{currentTime}) AND check_state=#{checkState} and created_way=#{createdWay}
